what critics of colleges often miss is that the proof of work is often important to the person themselves.

not everyone is able to navigate and find their way immediately - colleges and polytechnics are very very valuable mental and social gestative nests in that sense. 

i
colleges are basically like bitcoin. there is no valuable output from time and energy invested except proof of work but the proof of work is immensely valuable in and of itself.
essentially transforming seemingly pointless energy expenditure into profoundly valuable signals
